text: Polvijärvi is a municipality in North Karelia, Finland. As of 19 September 2023, 4,086 people lived there. Its area is . Neighbouring municipalities are Juuka, Kaavi, Kontiolahti, Liperi and Outokumpu. Polvijärvi was founded in 1876. == Other websites == * Municipality of Polvijärvi – Official website Category:Municipalities of North Karelia Category:1876 establishments in Europe Category:1870s establishments in Finland
title: Polvijärvi
